website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for its compact design and low-noise operation but comes with the possibility of a few issues that could affect performance.
pros: A slim drill that fits easily in a bag for manicures on the go
Doesn't make a lot of noise when in use
Includes a collection of bits for different nail grooming needs
cons: A few drills stopped working for unknown reasons
Drill bits are a little difficult to change

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and great for doing nails at home! Good quality. Take practice, and do not drill repeatedly at one spot as it will turn hot and might burn your nail.
customer_reviews.author: Zimeng Song

customer_reviews.title: The only thing is it doesn’t come with a box to plug in the wall
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and thought what do I have to loose ! Let me just say this thing is amazing the price is amazing and it works just like the ones in a salon fast shipping and easy easy to use goes slow or fast ! Amazing 😉
customer_reviews.author: DAVINA

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: I get my nails done every 3 weeks they grow so fast I have to file them down constantly with a file and takes forever I use this nail drill bit it takes me seconds to file and shape works great I should have bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful temperament more on the fhe first floor
customer_reviews.text: lt can make you more tempermemtal,beautiful,this is my need,feel l am superior in front of friends
customer_reviews.author: Cora J Moore

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NAIL DRILL!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews for purchases but I had to with this one. I have gone through numerous e-files but I have never encountered one as good as this one!! I love how it comes with so many drill bits AND that the drill has a switch to drill in forward or reverse. Some other great qualities of this product is that it is low noise, lightweight, and the speed can be adjusted to slower or faster. I definitely recommend this drill For its quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good size
customer_reviews.text: It is very tired to file the nails with the common files, but this device is fast, precise and very easy to use and leaves the nails as I like them. It is very simple to adapt to it and thus be able to shape the nails
customer_reviews.author: Sophie San

customer_reviews.title: It saves me so much time
customer_reviews.text: I am beginner. It is very easy to operate and control the speed. Very light weight, smoothing and much quieter. Not burning me I am super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Uka

customer_reviews.title: Great gift package
customer_reviews.text: My 10yo daughter is getting into nails and wanted to learn how to polish and do gel nails. This kits easy for her to use by herself or on her friends. I purchased the light and gel nail polish to go with. It makes a big difference to do the whole process before applying gel polish. Packaging was nice and really added to the gift!
customer_reviews.author: MikeSmith

customer_reviews.title: Not only works on nails but also removes callus
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my wife. I saw she was using a set of metal nail filers to polish her nails. This drill has a pretty long wire. Use a power bank to supply the power and can move around freely. In order to get the first hand experience, I used one head to file my thick callus on my heels which I can’t remove with a callus filer. It works great. Can switch the rotation direction, can adjust speed. It removes most of the callus and later I can use the callus filer to get rid of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: viola

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking into buying an electric nail drill, I highly recommend this one. At first I was skeptical about it, but since I wasn't willing to buy an expensive one I proceeded into getting it and don't regret at all. Very easy to use for beginners and the kit has plenty of drill bits to use from. Very low noise and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set up for a first tool
customer_reviews.text: The efile came on time and I couldn’t wait to see what it could do. * I’m not a pro I just enjoy doing my own nails!* I immediately tried it out on my poly gel / acrylic dip nails and to my surprise it busted right through it! This will be a great benefit in my nail care routine by cutting the time down that it takes me to do my own nails. The forward and reverse switch is all an added bonus for when I’m using it left handed. The machine itself is light and east to maneuver. I can’t wait to use it on my fresh set and see the progress of my skills.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with them
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and to change the tops , really light weighted also fits on your hands like a pen , super powerful to remove gel polish and acrylic nails ,also useful for file nails and clean them on the cuticles area ! What a easy and handy product !
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! In these desperate times when going to the nail salon is not possible. It help to take off the tips and smooth down the nails.
customer_reviews.author: Ashraf Ghaziani

customer_reviews.title: I love this nail buffer such a great price at under $12
customer_reviews.text: I love this nail buffer such a great price at under $12! It’s cordless and rechargeable, it works perfect had two speed setting options and does the job just right! Comes with 11 drill dits and 6 sanding bands!! I can do my nails on my own now soo much cheaper! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: krystle stolleis

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I’ve used it multiple times and this is my 1st electric nail drill. I like the speed control and multiple drill bits. Swapping out the bits takes only a few moments, in which it seems right to pull slowly but that’s a judgment call. My nail tech swaps her drill bits out in seconds with a loosing and tightening mechanism, but her drill works all day everyday. This drill may be stronger than I think but I don’t want to temp fate ....and for the price it’s worth it! Great little drill. Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: J. Case

customer_reviews.title: Best little nail drill!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a powerful little drill. It's lightweight, easy to use and gets the job done. If your looking for a nice nail drill, look no further. The company is big on customer service and support. Best money I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Nicolaisen

customer_reviews.title: Just like a professional at nail salon! Save you money.
customer_reviews.text: Just like a Pro! Second was replace send it right away it works great.. Can't wait to try it. Practical take it were ever you go.
customer_reviews.author: Ili💓

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Stopped working after filing one nail!!!! I will be sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Keia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: This e-file replaces my old one, which gave up the ghost after about 10 months. Since I only use my file on my own nails, I expected more out of it. This file is so much more attractive than the cheap one, and it feels nice to hold. The controls are on the cord, not the file, but that's typical of this style. I like the extra tips it has - they come in handy. I've only been using this one about a month, so I'm not sure about longevity, but I'll update my review if there are any problems. So far, I'm quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mind WandererTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied)))
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky, but I am completely satisfied with this product. Compact, fits well in the hand, the rotation speed is very easy to control, there are all the necessary nozzles. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stvolrz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional nail artist I am just trying to diy my nails at home. So this remove tool is perfect for me. I can remove the gel easily myself. I will recommend to anyone who do it yourself to use this product for your nails.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman W

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great e-file for beginners. Just what I needed to start doing my own nails at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable & good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Amazing quality and you get a lot for your $. Only complaint I have is I would have liked for the instruction book to go more in depth about what each drill bit is for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this nail drill may 29th and it broke July 22nd. It wasn't being used daily. Maybe once a week. As it was spinning it completely detached. Now its in the garbage and I can not return because the window closed on July 9th! Don't waste your money on this nail drill!
customer_reviews.author: CINDY CRUZ

customer_reviews.title: This Nail Drill feels like a pen in your hand
customer_reviews.text: With Covid out its extremely hard to find yourself get together and go out to get your nails done. I looked for a solution and watch some videos online to find what works and isn't hard on the pocket. Here is where this awesome Nail Drill comes into play. I like that fact that it is small, comes well packaged and works off of a regular power brick that you would use to charge your phone. Extra kudos for being able to use it from a powerbank just as well. In my opinion priced right and easy to use for a noob.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Easy to shape and smooth my rough manicure. Love the tool to get into the edges. Also use on my small child nails instead of clippers, he likes it better because it tickles
customer_reviews.author: Marjory Elzerman

customer_reviews.title: Wish these lived longer...not even a solid week
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be a great product at first glance.... inexpensive, and fairly easy to use, but then the second time I used it -it completely stopped working , so i bought another one just like it, thinking maybe I just got a defective one... Within a week of using the second one, the second drill stopped working....two drills motor creatures ur 7th
customer_reviews.author: william canet

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY DONT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s extremely hard to change the bits on it. I used mine a couple of times and it stopped working. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!! I’m returning this garbage
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: This will make you appreciate  your nail artist.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is easy. I can tell it will last a long time. That said, it is harder than one might think. It will take time to get the skill to do yourself. I took the gel both off my feet and hands. If you are left or right-handed you will have the same problem, and that is doing the opposite hand. Once you do it a few times you will probably pass the learning curve. Other than that, it is sturdy, nice looking and it came here pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Elkee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Bargin
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this set, I feel like a professional nail tech with all the versatile attachments. The price is great, any tool to ad on the pamper your feet and hands, attachments are a bonus. I used the drill, good grip, easy to handle, this product came quickly. I did not have to contact customer service but if I did I am sure they would be very quick and efficient at handling question or concerns about the product. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: It’s very compact and easy to put everything together and store once you’re done. It’s a nice tool to have for that in between period when your nails start to grow out. It’s versatile too. You can basically do anything you need to for a new set or simple clean up. Very easy to round out the edges near the cuticles. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jo F Condra

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bits and Vibration
customer_reviews.text: For beginners only. The bits are not good quality. The drill isn't balanced and makes a vibration on your nails like when you drive on the edge of the road and your car vibrates. It is not a smooth process but it will get the job done, plus you can practice your skills.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will need this nail drill!
customer_reviews.text: I love this easy to use nail drill. I was able to do my mani and pedi myself since nail shops are closed. Instructions were clear for each nail bit. Definitely easy to hold when you find which position is comfortable for your hand. It's not noisy and it's durable. Surprisingly, during this horrible time, I received my nail drill a week earlier than expected. That was a plus! Thank you again for an amazing affordable product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bee W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , very light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Currently I am doing mobile mani pedi and i am learning new dip in powder one . Drill machines were very expensive at the supply stores . Thats why i got way cheaper one from amazon at first and now i am so glad that i did it . I am using this one for my practice also to remove gel colors acrylic nails on my customers. It really helps me to save times , makes easy my job only i am thinking i should have this kind of thing before .
customer_reviews.author: Zoe B

customer_reviews.title: Light & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The item it's self is great as is. Very easy to work with. Light and easy to store put away as it doesn't take up much space. I love how it comes with the variety of drill bits. I personally use it for acrylic nails and it has made it very easy to file and shape nails!! I would definitely recommend! The only downside to the item is that the cable for the drill did not come with a cube to plug into wall. I had to use my phones charger cube...
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is the alender profile of this e-file. It also fits very comfortably in the hand. Compared to similar E-Files It weighs less and looks more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Damarys USA Central Florida

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill set for your $ nails stay looking good during Pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little drill set for sure! Definitely has lasted longer than the last Amazon junk I bought the little box with a dial. I wish it had more power like the little box kind and polarity isn’t as strong on reverse. One last thing I wish it plugged into the wall itself not a USB :/ but overall my nails are staying fancy through pandemic so I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill. I have recently started doing dip nails with extensions and this drill works wonders. I have had it for about 3 weeks now absolutely no issues. I have done 2 sets of nails on myself with this drill as well as 3 sets of nails on friends and it is still going strong. I definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Great for nails and tortoise beaks
customer_reviews.text: I got this initially for my poly gel nails after I started doing them on my own, but because of the adjustable speed and quietness of it I decided to give it a try for my tortoises slightly overgrown beaks. The attachments are small enough that even when they moved around a bit I was able to trim the lil bit of overgrowth with a lot less stress to both of us :) I would 100% recommend it for both nails and tortoise beak trims :)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great quality . Beginner friendly & affordable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use. Worked great to remove my polygel nails . This was my.first time using a efile and it was easy to figure out. I just wish it came with a little instruction guide with the name of each drill bit in it. But it was easy to YouTube which attachment was for what. Over all I would definitely buy it again Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Aten

customer_reviews.title: Handy Nail Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Package included everything I needed to fix my ingrown toe nail. It has different settings, the low speed helped trim toe nail efficiently. Multiple bit sizes also helped in trimming. Only recommendation is to make the body a bit bulkier as it was difficult for me to hold it, otherwise served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Saam

customer_reviews.title: The drill is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy from this company again! The seller is responsive (I didn't have any problems), and their products are inexpensive for what you receive!
customer_reviews.author: Skj616

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It’s easy to use and lightweight. Has professional quality. I ordered this since the nail salons are closed and I had gel on my toes. It took all the gel off without damaging my nails.
customer_reviews.author: ruby hamilton

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: while quarantined- my acrylic nails were coming off and no salons were open. I bought this thinking it would be junk- BOY WAS I WRONG_ THIS IS AMAZING!!!! it worked great at taking off my acrylic nails and I now use it to smooth out the ridges of my natural nails. I HIGLY rec'd! LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What a powerful little drill. It's lightweight, easy to use and gets the job done. Works great! In these desperate times when going to the nail salon is not possible. It help to take off the tips and smooth down the nails. If you looking for a nice nail drill, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It was fine while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after using it three times. I purchased this since I have started doing my own nails at home. I pulled out my supplies to do my nails today and it came on for a minute and went back off. I checked the cord, the socket and the bits. Nothing worked. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli J.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, works just ok
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. You have to plug it into a USB port to charge it. It only comes wit the USB cord, so you have to supply either a computer or plug in end with a USB port to charge it. None of the heads that come with it work that great at removing dip powder nails. You have to use it for like 7-10 minutes per nail just to get through it and you can't hold it on your nail for long periods of time or it gets super hot and burns your nail bed. Overall it is what you could expect for how cheap it is. Just a cheap product overall.... not very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Good Nail drill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as I started doing my nails because it is so expensive ($100) going to do my nails every 3 weeks. I can hold it very easily, as well as use it on my own nails very easily. This little kit has the nail clipper and all different sizes to file my nails. This does the job for myself at home, it files my nails faster than manually doing it and also it bring different speeds so you can choose the right speed for you. It does a great job in my opinion to bring everything I need on my nails. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Erdenejargal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Love my new nail drill set! Easy to use for beginner. Must test each bit to figure out each function since the user manual do not explain the details. Due to the closure of nail salons in the area, this is an essential tool to maintain nails and home. DC/USB plug is convenient to use, nails can be maintain anywhere! Life time warranty is a plus! Hopefully the service on repair would swift when there is a problem in the future. Update to be followed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moster

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my toes. I have always done my own feet with manual tools like a file and buffer but this makes it much faster to get the job done. It works great, I like that it came with a variety of heads and a speed and direction option.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M

customer_reviews.title: The best drill I brought
customer_reviews.text: This by far is the best drill I ordered from Amazon it's easy to hold has multiple speeds and comes with buffers pallets you can beat it for the price the only thing it don't come with a power adapter but every one has one of them sitting around somewhere 😂
customer_reviews.author: Monica brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight and fits perfectly in my hand. I love how easy it is to use and that it’s gentle enough for beginners like myself, but powerful enough to do the job. Leaves nails smooth and polish. Did I mention the color is gorgeous! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: am very excited about this new nails drill! super simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: now that I have to figure how to do my nails on my own, I did a but of research on what drill to get and the good reviews lead me to this one, and oh my this is so good! I am very proud that I did not need to read instruction and it was so simple to use, I feel that I become an expert nail artist! now I can keep my nails in wonderful shape at all times! I am very Happy with this kit! also! the pink color make sit super feminine! I looove it!
customer_reviews.author: Maryam

customer_reviews.title: Leightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Some are bulky and weigh alot but this one is small and handheld and lightweight. Easy to hold. An amazing gift for any nail stylist. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amanda & Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: So I received my product and it’s worth more than it’s priced. Very very good quailty.... only con is the booklet isn’t detailed on the tools on how and when to use them but it’s ok I’m sure I can find how to use on YouTube. Overall a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great plug in buffer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only think is that it needs to stay plugged in to work. I thought it was rechargeable with the usb cord but it isn't. I would like a longer cable of it needs to stay plugged in but other than that I love all the attachments and 2 direction modes.
customer_reviews.author: CC75208

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy !
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this purchase, it was always difficult to remove the gel. After purchasing the drill, however, it is very easy to remove the gel. It is my first time to use it and it is not dangerous at all. It is easy and comfortable for everyone to use. The handle for the drill and the speed controller are also very convenient. I am glad that I don’t have to go to the shop to get my gel removed from now on. You can save time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Oh

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This nail drill works pretty well. Easy to use and came with pretty pink color. My favorite part for this product is it doesn’t need AA battery and came with charger. And the noise is really small. Also it has different options like buffer. This is an all in one product.
customer_reviews.author: Z X.

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: There were no directions in the package. Not good for first time user!
customer_reviews.author: richardson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The appearance and texture are very good, it is very simple to use, it can be operated quickly, the rotation speed is very stable, and the effect of the grinding is also good.
customer_reviews.author: shufen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought BUT it works well. I used it to file acrylic and it never stopped. Filed it. Does it's job. Recommend. For beginners especially. I added photos. The corner of the box is damaged, that's my fault!! I opened it aggressively. Lol. Just didn't want anyone to think it came that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cuticles and nail beds!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I like the adjustable speed control. Using for basic mani/ pedi not artificial nails. Does a very thorough cleaning of nail beds and cuticles. The price point was very good compared to other similar products, especially if it is being used only periodically and for simple tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: No charger
customer_reviews.text: For a product that does not include a charger - the USB cable that comes with it is too short.
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great thing.
customer_reviews.text: Why haven't I bought this before? It was necessary to buy and make a manicure earlier would be much more convenient and better. Easy and good. It is convenient to hold in your hand. Easy to change nozzles. There are all the necessary nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya-2

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gadget
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely gadget. I'm always have a problem with my nails and with this tool everything get better. I ordered this since I have been getting into doing my own nails .Then, You do not have to go to salon to polish your nail.The device is fast, light and does not make noise. It's smaller than what I thought. Easy to use with multiple type of buffers and drills. It has multiple functions.I've never have an experience to work with such stuff but I really like this.Amazing price for such a cool gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Sssn

customer_reviews.title: Great electric nail drill and price
customer_reviews.text: Great electric nail drill. It's really easy to use and powerful electric nail drill. And it includes a lot of useful bits. If someone looking for an electric nail drill I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: time saver
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to understand the function and very light weight. I love the color. I had same one that I bought from here on Amazon as well but I cannot find it and had to buy new one. It is best for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: This product works great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It has a USB power connector so I plug it to my portable charger (does not come included) and do my nails from the confort of my couch, bed or wherever I want since I am not restrict to a power outlet. It’s also very quiet which is great since I have a newborn baby. I’m buying another one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with it, there's a sticky liquid that came from inside of the product, as you can see on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lea francisco

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this one of these last month and loved it. it was lightweight, portable, and came with the drill bits. which made me buy another one for one of my apprentice students. a month later it now has a shortage in it. it continues to turn on and off & messes up my acrylic sometimes. it sucks because before i had a dremel that i used for the past 3 years and it still works. i just bought this one because it was smaller and more practical. my dremel is big and bulky. but i’m extremely upset that a month later it’s basically garbage 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Something went wrong with mine.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine on July 3 2020. I have used it five or six times. For some reason the gold peace where you push the drillbit in comes out and will not go back in. I don’t know it if it broke are I’m doing something wrong. I absolutely Love this drill. Just don’t know what has went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great device for doing nails. Easy to use it and it has everything you need to do your nails at home. The price is also great compared to the other similar devices.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for those in Cosmetology School!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my friend who is in cosmetology class and she’s wanting to start her own business. I thought this would be great to start her out with she was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique20161

customer_reviews.title: Great Nail Drill, wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife usually doesn't do the nail stuff, but after I got this for her, she started to use it to trim and polish the nail, this tool is easy to use, great for beginners, my wife enjoy this very much!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great drill for DIY nails
customer_reviews.text: I really like this drill. It's light weight and really smooth to use. The quality is really great. The accessories are easy to change out back and forward. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shopzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my personal nail salon
customer_reviews.text: Before COVID-19 my mother and I went to the nail salon. Then they were all closed. A coworker started doing her own nails for the samereason. She did such a great job I thought well I'd it myself. Per her recommendation I bought this nail drill and am very happy I did. Takes off color much faster that soaking it off!
customer_reviews.author: Alyce L. Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: very nice to use
customer_reviews.text: I received the nail drill several weeks before, and I like it very much because it is very easy and nice to use. I can adjust both the power and directions of it. the power is enough but the noise is small. there is not much vibrate when I used that, and it was very comfortable to hold. what's more, many accessories are included.
customer_reviews.author: DCT

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works great with the USB cable. I can enjoy my show while doing my nails. It's easy to use with the low speed and it comes with different polish tips. I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hei F.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping could be better, overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: FAST SHIPPING, powerful tool, easy to assemble and use. Worst part was the shipping, I lowkey thought I received a USED product or something because of all the scratches and everything was scattered everywhere in the box. Great tool though!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: One of the best I've ever used. Easy to use and very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: mslexus1229

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: As an ex-nail technician I really like this nail dremmel, worth the money especially for beginners or people who don't have a lot of money and want do their own nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong and with very much pressure it will stop but will start right back. Great learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The drill bit works well and I like all the extensions. But I will say the placing of the speed control is weird. I prefer it on or closer to the actual drill. where as this is a little down on the wire.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lil nail drill
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent little drill! I only used the first two Drill bits and they do it’s job! I’m impressed how this lil thing works!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha mcbean

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This works great for beginners like me. It come with instructions and tells you what you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous8889

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and contain all kinds of drills. Easy assembly. The most important part would be the speed control. I can choose the mode I want. Good quality with good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It works great and comes with all the bits you need. Speed control is easy to use. Changing bits is easy. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been practicing my own dip powder nails while in quarantine and this is very helpful. I’ve never used an electric nail system before and this is great for beginners. It has enough power to get the job done and all of the attachments are included.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this little drill! I am not experienced with this and honestly thought I’d end up hurting myself with it. I started doing my own acrylics and this still makes it much easier! Only a few minor cuts my 1st time.. just be careful and take ur time. Works great for gel polish too!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so that I could cut down my nails in between getting fillings done period so far it works great and I'm able to use my phone and laptop without constantly making typos I would recommend this to anybody who is a beginner or who may need it to trim their dog nails as well too
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: become familiar with the different attachments and what they are used for.
customer_reviews.text: I like the set very much, sturdy unit and pieces. It has different speeds plus it is quiet. There is many attachments to get a good manicure. I have not used it much yet but the time that I did I was happy. Good buy.....
customer_reviews.author: cylene turner

customer_reviews.title: so much faster
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing my own gels at home for about a year now and finally decided to order this drill and I'm upset I waited so long! its so much faster. this drill is great. super light, small for easy storage. works like a charm! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Demirjian

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: I have experience using these types of devices. It was very easy to use and worked well on my nails. I like the adjustable speed and direction.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I'm really glad I purchased it. I do wish I could keep it running not plugged into the outlet but it is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Worthington

customer_reviews.title: I love with this Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this product it is so light weight easy to use and is definitely for beginners. I used it to take off of gel and acrylic off me and my mom’s nails and it was super easy. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Its a must!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!! This electric drill is sooooo easy to use. I am no professional but it was inexpensive and does its job, and is so easy and gentle to use. My aunt does nails and hers hurts and leaves the nails throbbing and she spent at least $100 dollars for it. I am very happy with my buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This drill works very well and is quite easy to use. Speed controlled by you and the bits are easy to install and remove . The power adapter is long but not long enough for my personal use added an extension to lengthen. Doesn't come with a case that would have been a nice perk though doesn't make or break the tool. Would recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s great it’s as advertised. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product wasn’t good at all it was easy to use but it really didn’t work not enough power, bits kept falling off I really don’t even rate this product a 1 star but at least it came and all the pieces were there. This product really sucked😟🥴🥴
customer_reviews.author: James Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Very good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Love the drill, but which button is for the reverse. Would be nice to add that for us that's new to this.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

product_meta.title: Upgraded Electric Nail Drill Bits Set, Professional Electric Nail File Machine for Acrylic Nails Gel Nails Kit, Portable Efile Nail Drill Manicure Pedicure Tools Best Gifts for Women Girls (Gray)
feature_bullets: UPGRADED PROFESSIONAL NAIL DRILL SET: The sets with 6 different shank drills bits, 6 sanding bands and 5 Manicure bits(Exclusive offers). It is can be used for manicure, pedicure, polishing and removing excess cuticles, or pets nail beauty and so on. Good choice for both home and salon use. it also can be use on small leather goods, wood and wall carving, punching and sanding.

UPGRADED STYLISH & PORTABLE DESIGN: High-density aluminum alloy body with anti-slip surface treatment make it anti-scratch, anti-fall paint, anti-drop. and Pencil-shaped appearance at the handle for comfortable and firmed grip, and the lightweight design (0.8 * 5.1 inches and 2.5 ounces)make it easy to use and perfect for travel.

UPGRADED PRODUCT PERFORMANCE: High-tech speed bearing and upgraded internal motor , makes the nail drill machine stable quality, low voice, and slight vibration when manicure. Great aluminum body for efficient heat dissipation and long time working.

ADJUSTABLE SPEED & DIRECTION UPGRADED POWERFUL MOTOR : can reach the highest speed in 3S, Scrolling speed buttons to flexibly control the speed from 0-20000RPM. And the forward and reverse rotation direction can be selected according to your habits.

SAFETY & EASY TO USE: It is easy to change the drill bit without tools, just pull it out and insert it. Standard USB interface, just need to connect the power cord with it to start working. Tesoky brand team provide 24-hour customer service online service for any questions. Refund and replacement is also available to ensure the best shopping experience.⚠NOTE: Applicable For 5V 1A/2A Wall Adapter.
